column5: After the pain I went through for 2+ weeks and now today,I have sworn off line biting. Had a tooth pulled yesturday,cracked in three places,caused by biting some 30 pound mono backing.I have always cut/broke off my line with my teeth since I can remmember,but after this very discomfortable feeling,no more.  I hate pain,but ya got to like the comforting meds.
been there done that..... as long as you're good to go..for your pike tourney..all will be well
I always use nail clippers to cut my line...  Maureen
That so girlie Mo.LOL Yep I got some that I will be using now.  Terry,thats why I had it done yesturday.And no smoking,dont need that dry socket pain. Been there done that too.

Ever think of useing the milk bag cutters. Or to be Manly why not mount a 5 horse motor with a horizontal crank shaft and attach 4o straight razors on to it. It will cut your line fast and you can still use it to cut the kobassa for your finger sadwiches l mean subs. lol   Peace Ken
Hey Brian a pair of side/wire cutters are a little more manly than clippers.LOL
But they don't work worth crap on power pro....
Yes, you certainly are OFF.  OFF your rocker that is!
